resources.string: This activity will show a list of the albums in the music library. Tapping an album will go to another activity with the list of tracks in this album.
This activity will show a list of the artists in the music library. Tapping an album will go to another activity with the list of tracks by this artist.
This activity will show detailed information about the track currently played.
This activity will show a list of the playlists in the music library. Tapping a playlist will go to another activity with the list of tracks in this playlist.
This activity will show a list podcasts in the music library. Tapping a podcast will go to another activity with the list of tracks in the selected podcast.
This activity will show a pane with fields to enter criteria for album, artist, track name, etc. The results will be shown as a playable list in another activity.
The results will be shown in this activity
